battle.phase_buttons.restart.confirm.con:
This will <style="status">reset</style> the state of the Battle as if you undid everything manually.

Do you want to <style="status">Restart</style> this Battle?
battle.phase_buttons.end_battle.tooltip: When you are Satisfied with the outcome of this battle you can click this button to end the battle and go back to the campfire.
battle.status.commit.dialog.title: Leave the Battle?
battle.status.commit.dialog.description:
This will <style="status">commit</style> the result of the Battle and <style="status">End this Turn</style>.

If you <style="status">leveled-up</style> you will receive any associated <style="value">Rewards</style>.

<style="value">Tips:</style> Don't forget that in <style="value">After Battle</style> phase you can still use effects for <style="status">Healing</style>, creating Mana Crystals or <style="status">Refreshing</style> Followers.
battle.status.commit.dialog.with_healing:
You still have remaining <style="value">Healing</style> points and your Character or Followers are <style="wound">wounded</style>.

If you leave now, these points will be <style="sacrifice">forfeited</style>.

Do you still want to <style="status">commit</style> the result of the Battle and <style="status">End this Turn</style>?
battle.status.defeat.title: You are <style="wound"><size=+5>Defeated</size></style>
battle.status.retreat.button.tooltip:
You are forced to <style="wound">Retreat</style> from the Battle when you failed to defeat the Enemies at the site that you are <style="status">Assaulting</style>.

Any <style="status">Rampaging</style> enemy you brought with you from the outside do not matter, they will just stay outside.

When retreating from the failed assault, you may be forced to take <style="wound">additional wounds</style>.
battle.status.victory.title: You are <style="value"><size=+5>Victorious</size></style>!

battle.tale.defeat.0: Unfortunately, this battle has proven too difficult for {0} and ended in a <style="sacrifice">Defeat</style>.
battle.tale.defeat.1: This disastrous battle ended in a <style="sacrifice">Defeat</style> for {0} and Followers.
battle.tale.defeat.2: The opposing forces were too overwhelming and the battle ended in a <style="sacrifice">Defeat</style> for {0} and Followers.
battle.tale.retreat.0: This ruinous battle has proven too difficult for {0} and ended in a <style="sacrifice">Defeat</style> forcing {0} and Followers to <style="status">Retreat</style> to where they came from.
battle.tale.retreat.1: This overwhelming battle ended in a <style="sacrifice">Defeat</style> for {0} and Followers. They will <style="status">Retreat</style> to where they came from.
battle.tale.retreat.2: The opposing forces were too overwhelming and the battle ended in a <style="sacrifice">Defeat</style> for {0} and Followers. They will need to <style="status">Retreat</style>, falling-back to where they came from.
battle.tale.victory.0: {0} demonstrated their superiority and <style="value">Triumphed</style> in this epic battle!  Time to collect the spoils of battle.
battle.tale.victory.1: {0} was <style="value">Victorious</style>! The opposing forces were <style="status">vanquished</style> by {0}'s sheer power and mastery. Time to collect the spoils of battle.
battle.tale.victory.2: The opposing factions were not match for {0}'s skills and this battle was a <style="value">Resounding Victory</style>! Time to collect the spoils of battle.
